eade8436-a4c5-4c37-a4ce-ed309c11e048.name: string
eade8436-a4c5-4c37-a4ce-ed309c11e048.description:
Receives string to be converted to lower case.

Example:
"Foo"

4ad7fe3e-7ca1-4d85-a495-3ec910a24d42.name: lowercase
4ad7fe3e-7ca1-4d85-a495-3ec910a24d42.description:
Sends `string` converted to lower case.

Example:
"foo"

name: string/Lowercaser
description:
Converts `string`  to lower case.

Example:
1. "Foo"@0  received via `string`
2. "Foo"@0  sent via `lowercase`
